roleset.name: attach to
roleset.note: APPEND-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. No Vncls. (from append.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: The budget reconciliation had to be dealt with by the Oct. 15 deadline, and these Senate Democrats refused to agree to allow a vote [0] [*T*-5]to append capital gains to the budget bill, knowing it would pass.
